events.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs was acquitted of racketeering and sex trafficking charges but found guilty on two lesser counts related to transportation of women for prostitution.

NYC’s most-watched fireworks display, a beloved Independence Day tradition.

events.eventName: Summer Streets Expanded for NYC’s 400th Anniversary
events.description: Summer Streets event expanded to 400 blocks, transforming streets into car-free zones filled with entertainment.

events.description: 20th anniversary of the Prohibition-era–themed party with live jazz and vintage cars.
